com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Class FileChooserParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium.FileChooserParams

  • public final class FileChooserParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents parameters that are passed to the DialogHandler.onFileChooser(FileChooserParams) method.
    表示传递给DialogHandler.onFileChooser（FileChooserParams）方法的参数。

      • getFilterDescription

        public java.lang.String getFilterDescription()
        Returns a meaningful description of the extensions accepted by the file chooser. The description can be used for setting up a custom file extension filter for the select file dialog.

        Returns an empty string in case of no extensions provided, which implies that all files are accepted.

        Examples: "Image files", "PDF File (.pdf)", "".
        返回文件选择器接受的扩展名的有意义的描述。该描述可用于为选择文件对话框设置自定义文件扩展名过滤器。如果没有提供扩展名，则返回一个空字符串，这表示所有文件都被接受。示例：“图像文件”，“ PDF文件（.pdf）”，“”。
        Returns:
        a meaningful filter description. 有意义的过滤器描述。
        See Also:
        getAcceptableExtensions()

      • getAcceptableExtensions

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAcceptableExtensions()
        Returns the set of file extensions accepted by the file chooser. The extension set is based on the accept attribute of the HTML input tag. The extension set can be used for setting up a custom file extension filter for the select file dialog.

        Returns an empty set in case of the accept attribute being absent or empty, which implies that all files are accepted.

        Improperly formatted extensions or nonexistent MIME types in the accept attribute are ignored.

        Example: {"png", "jpg", "bmp"}.

        Extensions are stored without preceding dot or any other pattern.
        返回文件选择器接受的文件扩展名集。扩展集基于HTML输入标签的accept属性。扩展名集可用于为“选择文件”对话框设置自定义文件扩展名过滤器。如果accept属性不存在或为空，则返回一个空集，这意味着所有文件都被接受。接受属性中格式不正确的扩展名或不存在的MIME类型将被忽略。示例：{“ png”，“ jpg”，“ bmp”}。扩展名存储时没有前面的点或任何其他模式。
        Returns:
        the list of acceptable extensions. 可接受的扩展名列表。
        See Also:
        getFilterDescription(), HTML input accept attribute

      • getSelectedFiles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSelectedFiles()
        Returns the full path of the selected file or NULL if file wasn't selected.
        返回所选文件的完整路径；如果未选择文件，则返回NULL。
        Returns:
        the full path of the selected file or NULL if file wasn't selected. 所选文件的完整路径，或者如果未选择文件。
